items.sentence: I couldn\'t help but notice that you\'re in pain.
Tom said we could ask him any questions we liked.
I wish my grandfather had been alive to see that.
I wish that I could give you everything you want.
I wish to sit here with you for a while and talk.
It looks like Tom needs to study a little harder.
It looks like Tom will be coming here next month.
It took us three days to walk through the forest.
Tom took his helmet off and put it on the ground.
I don\'t think Tom understood what was happening.
